document.full_text: france and nigeria circulated a draft resolution to the u.n. security council on friday that would impose sanctions on strife-torn ivory coast's incumbent leaders and ban heavy weapons from the abidjan area.
document.title: france asks u.n. council to sanction ivory coast's gbagbo
lines_and_colors: france and nigeria circulated a draft resolution to the u.n. security council on friday that would impose sanctions on strife-torn ivory coast's incumbent leaders and ban heavy weapons from the abidjan area.
